product_name: Pearl Izumi Select Tri Suit - Women's
long_description: You'll swim, bike and run your best in the women's Pearl Izumi Select Tri Suit with its wicking, quick-drying compression fabric, and a bra that you can leave on while the rest comes off. Mesh panels provide superb ventilation. Separate bra top offers maximum support and allows easy on/off access of the suit. Flatlock seams reduce irritation; plush elastic silicone grippers keep shorts from riding up your thighs. Pearl Izumi Select Tri Suit sports a 7.5 in. zipper for ventilation and a small quick-access envelope pocket for energy gels. Tri fleece chamois dries quickly for comfort in the saddle. Reflective elements aid visibility in low light.
